title: Facts Matter (Nov. 9): 15M Contaminated Doses Cause US Government to Cancel Contract With Major Manufacturer
description: The U.S. government recently canceled a major contract with a vaccine manufacturer after this particular company produced a batch of 15 million Johnson & Johnson vaccines that were found to be cont...
cleaned_text: The U.S. government recently canceled a major contract with a vaccine manufacturer after this particular company produced a batch of 15 million Johnson & Johnson vaccines that were found to be contaminated. Meanwhile, even after a federal court has officially issued a restraining order on the Biden administration's vaccine mandate, that doesn't appear to be stopping them. On Monday, the White House told private businesses that they should ignore the court order and continue to move forward with the vaccine and testing requirements. Lastly, according to a new statement from the secretary of Energy, it appears that not only are gas prices getting higher and higher, but also, it'll cost us more to heat our homes this upcoming winter. This comes as a pipeline is being blocked in Michigan. Resources: ? Sekur (promo code: Roman) ? Contract Cancelled: ? Biden Mandate: ? Hiring White Men: ? Heating Home: ?
